body.name: South Shore Crea Metal 2-Door Accent Cabinet, Pale Blue
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 6 hrs 56 mins
features: THE STORAGE YOU NEED: This metal cabinet is the solution to your storage problems. Put children's toys and DIY tools on its 2 adjustable shelves and 1 fixed shelf!

MINIMALIST STYLE: This storage unit follows the Scandinavian trend, which stands out because of its straight lines and symmetrical look. The solid doors, which close with a magnet, are also a part of that Nordic look we love.
ANCHORING KIT: The cabinet comes with an anchoring kit that’s easy to install using the hole in back of the cabinet, which was designed for this very purpose.

EASY ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS: All products come with a clear assembly document that will guide you through all steps. If you have any questions during the assembly do not hesitate to contact South Shore Furniture for immediate support. This item is shipped in 1 box, make sure to have a friend with you

1-YEAR LIMITED GUARANTEE: South Shore is proud to stand behind this metal 2-door accent cabinet with an exclusive 1-year limited guarantee. Shop with confidence knowing your purchase is always covered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1-Year South Shore covers all defects on furniture parts and workmanship for a period of 1 year from the date of purchase. Assembly required (tools not included) Make sure to have a friend with you to assemble the furniture. Packaging Tested and Certified To reduce the risk of damage, South Shore has built an in-house ISTA laboratory to test all products’ packaging quality.

North American Manufacturer Furniture proudly made in North America for 75 years and complying with today’s quality standards. Designed by South Shore Furniture made for South Shore and complying with today’s quality standards. Easy Care Wipe clean with a dry cloth.

About South Shore Our purpose is to design and build furniture that’s beautiful, affordable and made for real life. Your life. Creating more storage, optimizing small spaces, and making sure form and function are fighting for control of your home! You see, our job is to simplify your life so you can make room for what matters.
Human service! Our agents are there at any time to answer all your questions and find solutions. This is why we affectionately call them our customer support heroes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Functional with Dysfunctional Instructions!
reviews.reviewText: I’m using this cute little cabinet to store back stock items in preparation for the apocalypse (don’t roll your eyes, you know it’s coming!). I have decent cabinet space for day to day but needed a little more that scaled well in my space and allowed me to start stashing more non perishables. This measured perfectly and satisfied my need for too much color!Now, the instructions really do suck (people aren’t kidding), and good luck finding a useful YouTube video to help. The instructions are sequentially awkward and if you’re like me and a slightly below average DIY talent then you’ll need to 1. Move even slower than you usually do. Yes you’ll hate it but it helps. 2. Look up the instructions on their website so you can zoom in SUPERCLOSE. I don’t have vision issues but I needed this.There are tons of random extra holes in this thing and you’ll want to just jam things into them. DON’T. This might be fun initially but will prove extra frustrating later when you actually need the things.It took me like 2 hours. I still had an issue getting perfect alignment on one of the doors (as you can see) but it’s fine. One of the other reviewers recommended different hardware which I also scooped up and loved. It adds a little sparkle which I appreciate.I love this thing - great price, super useful and pretty cute! Buy it. And if you’re good at giving instruction please create a decent YouTube video without terrible smooth jazz elevator doodley -do music. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like it!
reviews.reviewText: We got this to use as a shoe cabinet for our front hall.It's a great size, very attractive, easy to clean, easy to open and close with the magnetic doors, and seems stable.It took me about 10 hours to assemble. I love assembling stuff so I wasn't turned away by reviews saying it's hard to assemble. I'm not the fastest, I take my time. Most of the holes seemed too small for the screws, but a lot of them could be forced through with enough elbow grease and a regular philips screwdriver. One or two holes I had to use an electric drill to open up a bit more.The included magnets didn't seem to work for the doors, so I bought some stronger magnets at Lowe's for about $5 and they work fine. My cats haven't gotten into the cabinet yet.I debated about whether I wanted to use the wall anchors and decided not to. It doesn't seem to need them since it's against a wall and I didn't want to mark up my wall.It does look a little stark in white. I might put some stickers or hang something decorative above it.It's a bit of a project but it's the perfect size, looks good, and functions well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of the peach colored cabinets and love them. They had some of the best packaging I have ever seen for furniture and arrived in perfect condition. While the assembly instructions could be a little clearer in places, it’s pretty easy to assemble. I don’t understand the reviews saying things didn’t line up, that they needed to drill holes, etc., as everything fit together perfectly on both my cabinets. The only thing I don’t like is that some of the ends of screw stick out a bit, and you are supposed to cover them with these little rubber caps so the sharp ends are covered. It works okay, but I think the caps will eventually fall off leaving the screws exposed. But overall I am very happy with these cabinets and think they look really pretty and will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The color was beautiful
reviews.reviewText: It was highly damaged in transit so I can’t give an accurate review but the color was exactly as pictured and I will probably order it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take your time assembling. It is a good product.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cabinet because the exact matching items I purchased before are no longer available. It is (almost) identical to previously purchased ones from another vendor. I have put together a few of these style cabinets previously. I will admit with practice it does get easier. Illustrations are made to be somewhat universal (I think) between extremely similar products. That might add some confusion. Extra hardware is appreciated but does not help if you are not sure what you are doing. I think they are very well made, for what we are using them for (in our clinic/office). I was not a fan of the provided handles, so I found some different ones that would fit. It really made the cabinet look way better. See the attached photo of the handles I used to replace the originals... Cabinet is way better than the other 6 I bought before. YMMV. I will purchase more of this item and reccomend. If you are not good at putting this type of thing together, just get help. Take your time. Pay attention to the drawings. The screws would be useless if they were not tight. Do not drill new holes (if you think you need to, you put it together wrong). Back up or start over. Be prepared to flip it around, lay it down on carpet, to get a solid surface to get good leverage on the "tight" screws. It is a bit if a "knuckle buster" if you get in a hurry. Go slow. You can do this! I love mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this cabinet for storing fabric and loved the color. However, when I tried to put it together, there were no directions included in the box. When I finally got the directions off the website, the holes were too large to hold the screws in correctly. It was an absolute mess. Then, I had to figure out how to put it back in the box to send it back. It was like trying to put a baby back in the womb. I do not recommend purchasing this item unless you are bored and just like extra mental stimulation.
Facile à monter , résultat solide et durable !

The media could not be loaded. Honestly this was packages so well, arrived without any damage. It was very simple to put together. Some other reviews mention that the screw holes aren’t big enough when in fact they are, you just need to use a little elbow grease. If the holes were any bigger the screws would not sit tight as they should. I am actually very impressed. 6 stars!
I love these. It came much faster than I expected. It was package well so no damage. We took the doors off because it looks so cute without it!
